question: Who of the following became the first-ever Indian to win gold in javelin throw at the Commonwealth Games?
explanation: Neeraj Chopra became the first-ever Indian to win gold in javelin throw at the Commonwealth Games. The 20-year-old junior world record holder hurled the javelin to a distance of 86.47m to bag India's 21st gold at the Commonwealth Games 2018. The medal was India's first gold and overall third in athletics at CWG 2018.
